newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Dean Witter cuts CA EPS view.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Dean Witter cuts CA EPS view.

text.p: -- Dean Witter analyst Peter Rubicam cut his earnings estimates for Computer Associates International Inc's fourth quarter ending in March and for fiscal 1998, his office said.
-- The analyst retained his buy rating on Computer Associates stock and a 12- to 18-month target price of $70.

-- Rubicam reduced his fourth quarter estimate to $0.85 per share from $0.89 previously. His full year 1997 estimate is now $2.51, his office said. For the year ending March 1998, he cut his earnings outlook to $3.00 from $3.10 per share.
-- Rubicam's associate said he had made no changes in his revenue estimates.

-- The Dean Witter analyst's move ran counter to several Wall Street analysts who said they had lowered revenue outlooks for the company following the release of December quarter results Tuesday, but maintained earnings estimates.
